ygData.msgSnippet: ... this doesn t fix the UI problem unless you disable the drop feature thru the screen entirely.  so i guess i vote no on this. ... most of the time i switch
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:28 PM 6/21/00 -0400, you wrote:
>http://boards.station.sony.com/everquest/Forum4/HTML/054096.html
>
>Rimbuk
>Station Member posted 06-20-2000 08:08 PM
>----------------------------------------------------------------------------
>----
>If you can't design a bug-free interface where items don't drop through
>inventory slots, you shouldn't be able to drop stuff on the screen.
>Here are 2 solutions:
>1. Make a 'drop item' button right next to, or under, the destroy button.
>And add an option in the General menu, same as 'fast destroy item'.
>That would probably take some programming, but would be well worth it.

this doesn't fix the UI problem unless you disable the drop feature thru
the screen entirely. so i guess i vote no on this.


>2. Make it so you can't drop anything while the inventory is up on the
>screen. OMG! how easy it that?

most of the time i switch instruments i am not in the inventory screen.
i don't think this would be very useful at all. so i guess i vote no on this
too.

>Can I get votes on who likes these ideas?
